titleStmt.title: Some notes or heads of a preface and of a lecture Preached at Distinckorn--Hill, in the parish of Gaastoun. April 15. 1688. By master Alexander Shields preacher of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Shields, Alexander, 1660?-1700.

titleStmt.title: Some notes or heads of a preface and of a lecture Preached at Distinckorn--Hill, in the parish of Gaastoun. April 15. 1688. By master Alexander Shields preacher of the gospel.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by cataloger; date of publication suggested by title.
In another edition the lecture date precedes the title.
L Copy closely trimmed with some loss of print; some pages have considerable print fade.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library (reel 2097) and the Congregational Library, London (reel 2217).
